export var formatGigDate=function formatGigDate(rawDate){// Get the month spelled out (not int value).
var options={month:'long'};var month=new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-US',options).format(rawDate);return"".concat(rawDate.getDate()," ").concat(month," ").concat(rawDate.getFullYear());};export var formatFinalDate=function formatFinalDate(gigDate,festivalEndDate){var date=formatGigDate(gigDate);if(festivalEndDate&&gigDate.getTime()!=festivalEndDate.getTime()){var end_date=formatGigDate(festivalEndDate);date+=' - '+end_date;}return date;};
